tests.name: At the start Nano has costume 'nano-a'
When Nano is clicked the costume changes to 'nano-b'
When Nano is clicked the stage costume is set to 'space'
After Nano is clicked Nano asks 'What's your name?'
After the question 'What's your name?' is answered the answer is stored in the global variable 'name'
After the question 'What's your name?' is answered Nano says 'Hi [name]' for 2 seconds
Then Nano asks 'Are you OK [name]'
If the answer to 'Are you OK [name]' is 'yes' Nanos costume changes to 'nano-c'
If the answer to 'Are you OK [name]' is 'yes' Nano says 'That's great to hear!' for 2 seconds
If the answer to 'Are you OK [name]' is not 'yes' Nanos costume changes to 'nano-d'
If the answer to 'Are you OK [name]' is not 'yes' Nano says 'Oh no!' for 2 seconds
Then Nanos costume changes to 'nano-b'
Nano then asks 'Do you want to go to the moon?'
If the answer to 'Do you want to go to the moon?' is 'yes' the stage costume changes to 'moon'
If the answer to 'Do you want to go to the moon?' is 'yes' Nano moves up, waits 0.1 seconds, moves down and waits 0.1 seconds for 4 times
Afterwards the program ends
If the answer to 'Do you want to go to the moon?' is not 'yes' the program ends
